title: Hewlet
author: Hewlet
content: You don observe say most people when de shout say job no de for this country na this two set of people?. it's either them no get skill or them get but no wan make use of the skill.Even most of the graduate when de complain say work no de or government no gree employ them, if you look them well you go observe say them be people when no too take there studies serious or them just focus on there studies and no add a single skill to wetin them go study for school.The society don really change a lot, and to be successful now, you need to be skilled at something and to also make the best out of your skill.I know some persons when de very good at writing but them know no say that one too na skill when de fit use get one or two money, there own na to use am for Facebook comment section take complain about how work no de for we country.There are others that are good at graphics, maths, hair dreasing and so on but they are not willing to develop it and will just keep criticizing and dictating errors from people doing those jobs.There was a time someone needed a tiller for his house and told me to bring in some guys for the job, I contacted some of my school friend that are into tilling and when I took them there and found out the amount they charged the man for the job eh, my brain burst. That was when I give big thumbs up to all skilled individual.The truth is that no skill becomes well refined when you've not started practicing it that much but ones you continue using it the right way, you will start improving on it and with time, people will see you as a lord in the craft.No let any person deceive you, being skilled at a trade in today's world is the key to your success. Village people don de almost die finish and majority of the chances of you being successful is in your hands, so make the best out of any little thing you are good at before sapa will make mess of you.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: When choosing a skill to learn, always check your interest and try to ensure that the skill you are wanting to learn will be relevant and one that will be able to still remain profitable in the future. Some skills are no longer worth learning because their profit margin is now so small that you financial situation will not change even after you struggle to learn it. So you must be very selective in choosing a skill to learn. Also do not be afraid to pay a huge sum of money to learn a skill, the benefit of a good skill far outweigh the cost in acquiring the skill.

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: Op, you done talk the correct thing way dey happen for this we country so, moreover now, especially this hardship period, pipo no suppose to just dey depend on only their educational results, make the also try to dey learn other skills join, mostly for their early age, because now I dey even see am am say, when person no gree learn skill for em younger age and when em don grow up to some extent, e go dey very difficult for the person to go acquire skills, because at that time the person head go just dey read money money money, and person way dey go learn skill no dey get money, that's nah other thing way dey make some pipo no dey gree learn skill. No matter anything, education or whatever, e good make person get skills too even if say nah only just one, like now for express road or for some street roads you go see some girls and even women way dey run transport with either Keke na pep or mini bus and some of these girls and women nah graduates, so just imagine say the women no get those skills, watin them for dey use feed? Con be say now way country dey hard.So skills dey important, even if say you A1 for school , you still need skills to take support the educational certificates way you get, so that if school certificate no favour you, skills go help.

comments.author: Cryptomultiplier
comments.body: I think we should send more of our kids and younger ones to vocational schools so as to learn good skills that real world impact, as compared to our outdated schools curriculum that teachers follow blindly. Learning a skill means one has to learn something that is doable and comes easy, naturally to them. You can call it passion or love for that thing. It also has to be something that can earn a good income and is sustainable.E no get watin I want talk now, wey pass this one o, because na so America take develop to watin e be today o!Unless you also like taking orders or being told what to do always, then please do learn a skill.

comments.author: adultcrypto
comments.body: Quote from: Hewlet on October 14, 2023, 07:07:29 AMYou don observe say most people when de shout say job no de for this country na this two set of people?. it's either them no get skill or them get but no wan make use of the skill.This na major problem my brother. Plenty people for our country no get skill and even though wey go university still carry theory full their head; no practical knowledge. If you wan check wetin I dey talk, call a graduate for electrical engineering to come do small electrical work for your house and see if him fit do am. Even the people wey study Mechanical Engineering still dey get issue solving small problem we dey connected to their area of study. I know say na our educational system. For the Nigeria we dey today, na skill dey fit dey save people... the normal white collar job no dey work again. I dey encourage every Naija youth to go learn skill because na the only way to survive. The skill wey fit pay in dollars supposed take priority sha because e get why.

comments.author: DubemIfedigbo001
comments.body: OP, you yarn better talk for here, wetin I wan add be say make people no go dey learn one skills or the other because say their friends dey prosper in it. Skills should be learnt based on passion and personality. you take inventory of yourself first and know what works for you and what you do effortlessly, that which you do with happiness, you go ahead and learn a skill in that path and your passion will spur success as compared to what you learnt out of maybe pressure. One thing is to learn a skill, another thing is to be keep being relevant in the field. you need to constantly upgrade yourself in the career to keep up with the competitive market. if you just learn a skill without being updated, you will become irrelevant with time. So learn a skill and keep upgrading yourself in the field and you are set for sure success.

comments.body: Op. you just said my mind, infact you have said it all. sometimes, I dey thank God for this hardship wah dey this country because people have understand the importants of leaning one or two skills. one of the mistakes I made was going to school without learning a skill. but today i thank God for everything. when you check well today you will know that those that have skill is also doing very well this period of hardship. the way this country is going, my children will learn one skill each before going to school.

comments.body: If not now majority of people don't have a skill and are not ready to have one but now that the situation of the economy is not longer favorable even with your certificate people don't have a choice than to change there perception over jobs and the importance of skill if your analysis is properly done you will noticed that people with skills that have demand are doing very well compared to people that work. Sorry to say but people are deceived by the name engineer because of that name they feel they don't need a skill which is a very poor mentality because i noticed something school is not even about learning a particular skill but its about learning how to survive and making your life better. Before the completion in school you must have learned one or two things from school that should be able to sustain through and after school a word has come to us if you don't have a skill get one it will be of great help.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.created_time: October 19, 2023, 09:53:25 PMLast edit: October 20, 2023, 11:30:29 AM by CryptSafe
comments.body: These days, the rate at which unemployment increases should be clear enough to send a signal to people, and the rate at which graduates are churned out of the university is enough to tell one to go get a skill. I stumbled upon a video in the past where a former president of the US was saying something related to this. If he, as president, could say such, then you should know that, in time, skilled people are going to take over the economy and workforce. That is why it is advised that one gets a skill—not just a skill but a skill—in line with the trend of development, which would be of good benefit and profit for them in the near future.Currently, the economy of the nation does not warrant one to start looking for a job and staying idle. At least it would be nice and beneficial if you had a skill at hand to help you sustain yourself in the long run. So to remain relevant, it is nice to get engaged by learning a meaningful skill that you will not regret doing in the future.

comments.author: Mr.suevie
comments.body: Acquiring a skill is something that should even be implemented in the school curriculum from secondary school because it will be of great help to people and it will also increase lot of awareness for people about the importance of actually securing a skill in a society like ours where their is limitation in manpower and job availability so being your own boss and business owner is actually the best thing that can happen to you.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: Onyeeze on October 20, 2023, 06:10:41 AME get wetin I understand for gambling and e get wetin somebody don tell me too, if you wan just leave a simple life without dey look for government to come and bring that their tribalism work just try to dey do something wey good for yourself, something wey for yourself is to be safe employed, if you learn work, like having a skill as op said it will be good then some one who don't have a work but the person dey base for government work to survive, for this our country naija we wey be citizens also be graduate we don't need to wait until government provide employment, with a little skill we can stand on our own.Being self-employed is the best alternative to rescuing oneself from the current economic situation of the country. Waiting for the government to employ you for a job is something that cannot be guaranteed because of the tribalistic sentiment involved in the whole process of the recruitment exercise. Even the government would tell you that they can not employ everybody at the same time and in some instances, they would say there are not enough funds to pay so therefore the employment volume is limited and there is nothing you could do about it So in this case, being self-employed is the only option and to do that, one would need to go for a skill and perfect it so as to attain mastery in the craft.
